name: Parkland Drift
description:
Welcome to Parkland Drift!

Our game was created for a week long Game Jam with the theme Accessibility. The constraint was to be playable with One Button, usable by everyone.

In Parkland Drift you control a dummy on a Rocket-Boosted Wheelchair, drifting along an infinitely procedural generated race track. 

Controls: 

Press and Hold Space bar to drift. Each time you press, you drift the other way.

Pick Ups:

Hearts give you 1 life; Mud slows you down; Coins add to the score; Turbos boost you up and Dogs make you lose a life.

Keep on drifting for High Score!
